data.name: APEX_CSP_DISPLAY_NONE
data.description: Ensures safe CSS inline exceptions using a centralized substitution string for display:none

data.name: APEX_FILES
data.description: Determines virtual path for images directory (formerly IMAGE_PREFIX)

data.name: APEX$ROW_NUM
data.description: References currently processed row number of submitted tabular form data

data.name: APEX$ROW_SELECTOR
data.description: References row selector checkbox state in tabular forms

data.name: APEX$ROW_STATUS
data.description: References row status (C for created, U for updated, D for deleted) in tabular forms

data.name: APP_ID
data.description: Identifies the current application ID

data.name: APP_ALIAS
data.description: Alphanumeric name for the current application, unique within a workspace

data.name: APP_AJAX_X[01-10]
data.description: Values of AJAX URL parameters used in On Demand AJAX processes

data.name: APP_BUILDER_SESSION
data.description: Current session ID of development environment if user is logged in as developer

data.name: APP_DATE_TIME_FORMAT
data.description: Application date time format specified in Globalization settings

data.name: APP_FILES
data.description: References application-specific uploaded files (formerly APP_IMAGES)

data.name: APP_NLS_DATE_FORMAT
data.description: Application date format of the database session

data.name: APP_NLS_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT
data.description: Application timestamp format of the database session

data.name: APP_NLS_TIMESTAMP_TZ_FORMAT
data.description: Application timestamp timezone format of the database session

data.name: APP_PAGE_ALIAS
data.description: Alphanumeric name for the current application page

data.name: APP_PAGE_ID
data.description: Current application page ID

data.name: APP_REGION_ID
data.description: ID of the current executing region

data.name: APP_REGION_STATIC_ID
data.description: Static ID of the current executing region

data.name: APP_REQUEST_DATA_HASH
data.description: Hash value of request parameters to detect different browser requests

data.name: APP_SESSION
data.description: Current session number for maintaining session state in links

data.name: APP_SESSION_VISIBLE
data.description: Similar to APP_SESSION but returns '0' for unauthenticated users with Zero Session ID

data.name: APP_TITLE
data.description: Alphanumeric title for the current application

data.name: APP_UNIQUE_PAGE_ID
data.description: Unique integer for each page view to prevent duplicate submissions

data.name: APP_USER
data.description: Current user running the application

data.name: APP_VERSION
data.description: Version number of the application

data.name: AUTHENTICATED_URL_PREFIX
data.description: Valid authenticated (logged in) URL prefix

data.name: BROWSER_LANGUAGE
data.description: Web browser's current language preference

data.name: CURRENT_PARENT_TAB_TEXT
data.description: Label of currently selected parent tab for two-level tab applications

data.name: DEBUG
data.description: Flag indicating if debug mode is enabled (Yes/No)

data.name: HOME_LINK
data.description: Home page URL of an application

data.name: JET_BASE_DIRECTORY
data.description: Base directory of Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit

data.name: JET_CSS_DIRECTORY
data.description: CSS directory of Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit

data.name: JET_JS_DIRECTORY
data.description: JavaScript directory of Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit

data.name: LOGIN_URL
data.description: URL for the login page

data.name: LOGOUT_URL
data.description: URL for logging out users

data.name: MAIN_APP_ID
data.description: Main application ID for working copies, otherwise current application ID

data.name: APP_TEXT$Message_Name
data.description: Access to application defined or system defined text messages

data.name: OWNER
data.description: Parsing schema of the APEX application

data.name: PRINTER_FRIENDLY
data.description: Indicates if APEX engine is running in print view mode

data.name: PROXY_SERVER
data.description: Application attribute for regions with URL sources

data.name: PUBLIC_URL_PREFIX
data.description: URL to toggle from logged in mode to public view

data.name: REQUEST
data.description: Value set by application buttons for accept processing
